text: Allan Anderson Brown (15 November 1924 – 9 June 2014) was an Australian rules footballer who played for the Collingwood Football Club in the Victorian Football League (VFL). His career ended prematurely due to a knee injury. == Notes == == External links == * * *Profile on Collingwood Forever Category:1924 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players Category:People educated at Northcote High School
title: Allan Brown (Australian footballer)
